<h3 id="X38079">X(38079) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(5), X(6)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 8*a^6-17*(b^2+c^2)*a^4+4*(b^4-9*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^2+5*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38079) = 5*X(2)+X(1351) = X(2)+2*X(18583) = 5*X(5)+4*X(575) = X(5)+2*X(597) = 7*X(5)+2*X(8550) = 13*X(5)-4*X(18553) = X(5)+8*X(25555) = 7*X(5)-4*X(25561) = 5*X(5)-8*X(25565) = 19*X(5)+8*X(33749) = 2*X(575)-5*X(597) = 14*X(575)-5*X(8550) = 13*X(575)+5*X(18553) = X(575)-10*X(25555) = 7*X(575)+5*X(25561) = X(575)+2*X(25565) = 19*X(575)-10*X(33749) = 7*X(597)-X(8550) = 13*X(597)+2*X(18553) = X(597)-4*X(25555) = 7*X(597)+2*X(25561) = 5*X(597)+4*X(25565) = 19*X(597)-4*X(33749) = X(1351)-5*X(14848) = X(1351)-10*X(18583)</b>
<p>X(38079) lies on these lines: {2,1351}, {5,542}, {6,547}, {30,5085}, {69,15703}, {140,20423}, {182,3845}, {373,14984}, {381,3618}, {511,11539}, {517,38089}, {518,38022}, {519,38040}, {524,15520}, {527,38164}, {528,38168}, {529,38169}, {549,3098}, {576,20582}, {599,3628}, {952,38023}, {1350,11812}, {1352,10109}, {1353,11178}, {1503,38071}, {1656,1992}, {3363,5182}, {3543,12017}, {3545,5050}, {3564,5055}, {3853,10541}, {3860,36990}, {5054,14853}, {5066,11179}, {5067,11160}, {5071,18358}, {5092,15686}, {5093,21356}, {5097,22165}, {5480,8703}, {5762,38088}, {5843,38086}, {5844,38087}, {5845,38080}, {5846,38081}, {5847,38083}, {5848,38084}, {5849,38085}, {5969,12040}, {6034,15048}, {6776,19709}, {8584,24206}, {9041,10283}, {9771,14645}, {11477,16239}, {11645,23046}, {12812,15069}, {14269,25406}, {14389,32227}, {14810,19711}, {15303,20304}, {15687,19130}, {15702,33878}, {17504,19924}, {20583,34507}, {21358,34380}, {28198,38118}, {28204,38049}, {28208,38146}, {28538,38042}, {31670,34200}</p>
<p>
X(38079) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 14848}, {3545, 5050}, {5054, 14853}, {5093, 21356}, {14269, 25406}, {38064, 38072}<br>
X(38079) = reflection of X(14848) in X(18583)<br>
X(38079) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (549, 5476, 21850), (3589, 5476, 549), (5480, 10168, 8703), (14561, 38064, 38072), (14561, 38110, 38136), (38040, 38167, 38165), (38090, 38091, 38023)<br>
</p>
